body.name: Area Rug for Living Room, 5x7 Feet Pink Shag Rugs with Memory Foam for Bedroom Dorm, Fluffy Shaggy Washable Carpet for Girls Kids Room Christmas Holiday
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 33 mins
features: Machine Washable: If you are satisfied with the style and softness of the soft memory foam rug, you can directly machine wash and dry it at a low temperature (or air dry in a ventilated place), and the rug will soon be flat and comfortable to use. Or lay it flat for 2 to 3 days and wait patiently for fur carpet to return fluffy.

Unique Design & Decor: This shaggy bedroom rug is made of the latest soft plush material, with red and white threads interwoven, which easily elevates the ambience and comfort of the entire space, such as bedroom, nursery, kids play room or home office, Christmas decorations.

Soft & Non-Shedding: The top layer of the living room rug is a durable synthetic fiber, silky and soft like faux wool, and in the middle is a 0.3-inch elastic memory sponge, increase the thickness and away from the cold floor, can turn a bare floor into a cozy lounge area.

Premium & Non-slip: The non-slip backing of the red and white rug is covered with thousands of plastic grip dots, so that the shaggy rug can provides a good grip and always stay in place, doesn't move around on the floor (Keep the floor under the carpet dry), perfect for pets & high traffic areas such as living room, dining room.

Low-Pile & Easy To Clean: The area rug is made of low-pile synthetic fibers that do not trap dirt or debris, more friendly to family members. A simple vacuum cleaner cleans the rug regularly, after a long time of use, you can do a deeper cleaning by machine washing, and air dry in a ventilated place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had to wash and dry after unpacking the rug because of a weird smell but after I did that it went away, the rug is so soft to the touch and the memory foam bottom makes it really soft to walk on, sit on, etc. it’s a shag rug but not too shaggy if that makes sense, can be easily vacuumed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect rug for my daughter’s room! It’s so soft! It did have a smell, but I opened the window and turned on the ceiling fan, and by the end of the day it was gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this rug covering the parquet wood flooring in the sitting area of my den. The brown goes well with the earth tones of my furniture and decor pieces. It feels incredible under foot, very plush/ thickly padded. It also seems constructed well enough to last for several years. The only minus was the smell. It comes vacuum sealed and has a heavy "manufacture" smell once you open it. I let it air outside overnight and that took care of it. Now it's almost perfect. Great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprising quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this purchase. I was quite skeptical at first when the 4x6 rug arrived in a vacuum sealed square package about the size of a seat cushion. Upon opening it up there was an extremely strong chemical smell, so much so that the smell filled the room. I hung the rug outside overnight to air out and the smell completely disappeared. The rug fluffed up nicely and is soft and thick - overall a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to wash
reviews.reviewText: One of our new dogs had an accident on it right after we put it on the floor. So we washed it and hung it up to dry. It came out still looking great and feeling soft. I will probably buy a second one so I can always have one on the floor while one is being cleaned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small packaging, but fluffs out nicely
reviews.reviewText: When I saw the package I wondered how the rug fit inside the box, but it's vacuumed sealed, and wrapped in plastic into a tiny little square. I was surprised with how small they managed to make it. After unwrapping it the rug immediately started to expand and fluff out to its intended shape and height. I don't feel comfortable vacuuming this rug because it's very light and I'm not sure how well it'll hold up to a vacuum's suction power, but it is machine washable. Mine arrived with a very heavy chemical smell. I washed mine 24 hours after opening to allow it time to fully expand before washing it. I saw no damage to my machine or the rug. The purple color is still a very vibrant almost royal purple. It's very soft and dried pretty quickly after washing. I did allow about 24 hours before I considered placing it down for use to ensure it was fully dried even though it felt dry to tough about 8 hours after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a really soft and deep plush rug, I wasn't expecting the nap to be so thick. I put it right beside my bed, so it's the first thing my feet feel when I get out of bed. My dogs love it too. I've mostly had floral patterned rugs lately, so the brown with geometric design is a nice change of pace. It's heavy enough that it wasn't too hard to vacuum, as long as I stood on the corners to weight them down so they wouldn't get sucked up. I haven't had problems with the rug sliding around or bunching up, but in a more high-traffic area that might be an issue.
